name: misdescribe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to describe something in a way that is not correct: If the goods were misdescribed or are faulty, customers are protected by law. We will remove any items that are mis-described. Related word
misdescription
More examplesFewer examplesThe car's been misdescribed and you have evidence that the advertised mileage isn't genuine, so you will win your case. There are honest traders who carelessly misdescribe their goods.They are inclined to mis-describe dead-end jobs as "entry-level".
